defmodule Solution do
  def max_sum(nums, k) do
    nums
    |> Enum.map(fn x -> {x, bit_size(x)} end)
    |> Enum.sort_by(fn {_, bits} -> bits end, :desc)
    |> Enum.take(k)
    |> Enum.map(fn {x, _} -> x end)
    |> Enum.reduce(0, fn x, acc -> acc + rem(x * x, 1_000_000_007) end)
  end
end
